message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $180?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I can only pay up to $120 for it. Looking forward to your response!
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I was thinking more along the lines of $160. Would you be willing to meet me there?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still believe I can only pay up to $140 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we settle on $155?
